data_table.description: Health Questionnaire SF-36, Offspring Cohort Exam 6

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: UNIQUE PARTICIPANT ID

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: COHORT IDENTIFIER

variable.name: SF1
variable.description: IN GENERAL, WOULD YOU SAY YOUR HEALTH IS:

variable.name: SF2
variable.description: COMPARED TO ONE YEAR AGO, HOW WOULD YOU RATE YOUR HEALTH IN GENERAL NOW?

variable.name: SF3
variable.description: THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT ACTIVITIES YOU MIGHT DO DURING A TYPICAL DAY. DOES YOUR HEALTH NOW LIMIT YOU IN THESE ACTIVITIES? IF SO, HOW MUCH? VIGOROUS ACTIVITIES, SUCH AS RUNNING, LIFTING HEAVY OBJECTS, PARTICIPATING IN STRENUOUS SPORTS

variable.name: SF4
variable.description: THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT ACTIVITIES YOU MIGHT DO DURING A TYPICAL DAY. DOES YOUR HEALTH NOW LIMIT YOU IN THESE ACTIVITIES? IF SO, HOW MUCH? MODERATE ACTIVITIES SUCH AS MOVING A TABLE, PUSHING A VACUUM CLEANER, BOWLING, OR PLAYING GOLF.

variable.name: SF5
variable.description: THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT ACTIVITIES YOU MIGHT DO DURING A TYPICAL DAY. DOES YOUR HEALTH NOW LIMIT YOU IN THESE ACTIVITIES? IF SO, HOW MUCH? LIFTING OR CARRYING GROCERIES

variable.name: SF6
variable.description: THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT ACTIVITIES YOU MIGHT DO DURING A TYPICAL DAY. DOES YOUR HEALTH NOW LIMIT YOU IN THESE ACTIVITIES? IF SO, HOW MUCH? CLIMBING SEVERAL FLIGHTS OF STAIRS

variable.name: SF7
variable.description: THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT ACTIVITIES YOU MIGHT DO DURING A TYPICAL DAY. DOES YOUR HEALTH NOW LIMIT YOU IN THESE ACTIVITIES? IF SO, HOW MUCH? CLIMBING ONE FLIGHT OF STAIRS

variable.name: SF8
variable.description: THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT ACTIVITIES YOU MIGHT DO DURING A TYPICAL DAY. DOES YOUR HEALTH NOW LIMIT YOU IN THESE ACTIVITIES? IF SO, HOW MUCH? BENDING, KNEELING, OR STOOPING

variable.name: SF9
variable.description: THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT ACTIVITIES YOU MIGHT DO DURING A TYPICAL DAY. DOES YOUR HEALTH NOW LIMIT YOU IN THESE ACTIVITIES? IF SO, HOW MUCH? WALKING MORE THAN A MILE

variable.name: SF10
variable.description: THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT ACTIVITIES YOU MIGHT DO DURING A TYPICAL DAY. DOES YOUR HEALTH NOW LIMIT YOU IN THESE ACTIVITIES? IF SO, HOW MUCH? WALKING SEVERAL BLOCKS

variable.name: SF11
variable.description: THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT ACTIVITIES YOU MIGHT DO DURING A TYPICAL DAY. DOES YOUR HEALTH NOW LIMIT YOU IN THESE ACTIVITIES? IF SO, HOW MUCH? WALKING ONE BLOCK

variable.name: SF12
variable.description: THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT ACTIVITIES YOU MIGHT DO DURING A TYPICAL DAY. DOES YOUR HEALTH NOW LIMIT YOU IN THESE ACTIVITIES? IF SO, HOW MUCH? BATHING AND DRESSING YOURSELF

variable.name: SF13
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS, HAVE YOU HAD ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS WITH YOUR WORK OR OTHER REGULAR DAILY ACTIVITIES AS A RESULT OF YOUR PHYSICAL HEALTH? CUT DOWN ON THE AMOUNT OF TIME YOU SPENT ON WORK OR OTHER ACTIVITIES

variable.name: SF14
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS, HAVE YOU HAD ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS WITH YOUR WORK OR OTHER REGULAR DAILY ACTIVITIES AS A RESULT OF YOUR PHYSICAL HEALTH? ACCOMPLISHED LESS THAN YOU WOULD LIKE

variable.name: SF15
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS, HAVE YOU HAD ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS WITH YOUR WORK OR OTHER REGULAR DAILY ACTIVITIES AS A RESULT OF YOUR PHYSICAL HEALTH? WERE LIMITED IN THE KIND OF WORK OR OTHER ACTIVITIES

variable.name: SF16
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS, HAVE YOU HAD ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS WITH YOUR WORK OR OTHER REGULAR DAILY ACTIVITIES AS A RESULT OF YOUR PHYSICAL HEALTH? HAD DIFFICULTY PERFORMING THE WORK OR OTHER ACTIVITES (FOR EXAMPLE, IT TOOK EXTRA EFFORT)

variable.name: SF17
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS, HAVE YOU HAD ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS WITH YOUR WORK OR OTHER REGULAR DAILY ACTIVITIES AS A RESULT OF ANY EMOTIONAL PROBLEMS (SUCH AS FEELING DEPRESSED OR ANXIOUS)? CUT DOWN ON THE AMOUNT OF TIME YOU SPENT ON WORK OR OTHER ACTIVITIES

variable.name: SF18
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS, HAVE YOU HAD ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS WITH YOUR WORK OR OTHER REGULAR DAILY ACTIVITIES AS A RESULT OF ANY EMOTIONAL PROBLEMS (SUCH AS FEELING DEPRESSED OR ANXIOUS)? ACCOMPLISHED LESS THAN YOU WOULD LIKE

variable.name: SF19
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS, HAVE YOU HAD ANY OF THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS WITH YOUR WORK OR OTHER REGULAR DAILY ACTIVITIES AS RESULT OF ANY EMOTIONAL PROBLEMS (SUCH AS FEELING DEPRESSED OR ANXIOUS)? DIDN'T DO WORK OR OTHER ACTIVITIES AS CAREFULLY AS USUAL

variable.name: SF20
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS, TO WHAT EXTENT HAS YOUR PHYSICAL HEALTH OR EMOTIONAL PROBLEMS INTERFERED WITH YOUR NORMAL SOCIAL ACTIVITIES WITH FAMILY, FRIENDS, NEIGHBORS, OR GROUPS?

variable.name: SF21
variable.description: HOW MUCH BODILY PAIN HAVE YOU HAD DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS?

variable.name: SF22
variable.description: DURING THE PAST 4 WEEKS HOW MUCH DID PAIN INTERFERE WITH YOUR NORMAL WORK (INCLUDING BOTH WORK OUTSIDE THE HOME AND HOUSEWORK)?

variable.name: SF23
variable.description: THESE QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT HOW YOU FEEL AND HOW THINGS HAVE BEEN WITH YOU DURING THE PAST MONTH. FOR EACH QUESTION, PLEASE INDICATE THE ONE ANSWER THAT COMES CLOSEST TO THE WAY YOU HAVE BEEN FEELING. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE PAST MONTH... DID YOU FEEL FULL OF PEP?
variable.value: A GOOD BIT OF THE TIME

variable.name: SF24
variable.description: THESE QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT HOW YOU FEEL AND HOW THINGS HAVE BEEN WITH YOU DURING THE PAST MONTH. FOR EACH QUESTION, PLEASE INDICATE THE ONE ANSWER THAT COMES CLOSEST TO THE WAY YOU HAVE BEEN FEELING. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE PAST MONTH... HAVE YOU BEEN A VERY NERVOUS PERSON?
variable.value: A GOOD BIT OF THE TIME

variable.name: SF25
variable.description: THESE QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT HOW YOU FEEL AND HOW THINGS HAVE BEEN WITH YOU DURING THE PAST MONTH. FOR EACH QUESTION, PLEASE INDICATE THE ONE ANSWER THAT COMES CLOSEST TO THE WAY YOU HAVE BEEN FEELING. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE PAST MONTH... HAVE YOU FELT SO DOWN IN THE DUMPS THAT NOTHING COULD CHEER YOU UP?
variable.value: A GOOD BIT OF THE TIME

variable.name: SF26
variable.description: THESE QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT HOW YOU FEEL AND HOW THINGS HAVE BEEN WITH YOU DURING THE PAST MONTH. FOR EACH QUESTION, PLEASE INDICATE THE ONE ANSWER THAT COMES CLOSEST TO THE WAY YOU HAVE BEEN FEELING. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE PAST MONTH... HAVE YOU FELT CALM AND PEACEFUL?
variable.value: A GOOD BIT OF THE TIME

variable.name: SF27
variable.description: THESE QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT HOW YOU FEEL AND HOW THINGS HAVE BEEN WITH YOU DURING THE PAST MONTH. FOR EACH QUESTION, PLEASE INDICATE THE ONE ANSWER THAT COMES CLOSEST TO THE WAY YOU HAVE BEEN FEELING. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE PAST MONTH... DID YOU HAVE A LOT OF ENERGY?
variable.value: A GOOD BIT OF THE TIME

variable.name: SF28
variable.description: THESE QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT HOW YOU FEEL AND HOW THINGS HAVE BEEN WITH YOU DURING THE PAST MONTH. FOR EACH QUESTION, PLEASE INDICATE THE ONE ANSWER THAT COMES CLOSEST TO THE WAY YOU HAVE BEEN FEELING. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE PAST MONTH... HAVE YOU FELT DOWNHEARTED AND BLUE?
variable.value: A GOOD BIT OF THE TIME

variable.name: SF29
variable.description: THESE QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT HOW YOU FEEL AND HOW THINGS HAVE BEEN WITH YOU DURING THE PAST MONTH. FOR EACH QUESTION, PLEASE INDICATE THE ONE ANSWER THAT COMES CLOSEST TO THE WAY YOU HAVE BEEN FEELING. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE PAST MONTH... DID YOU FEEL WORN OUT?
variable.value: A GOOD BIT OF THE TIME

variable.name: SF30
variable.description: THESE QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT HOW YOU FEEL AND HOW THINGS HAVE BEEN WITH YOU DURING THE PAST MONTH. FOR EACH QUESTION, PLEASE INDICATE THE ONE ANSWER THAT COMES CLOSEST TO THE WAY YOU HAVE BEEN FEELING. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE PAST MONTH... HAVE YOU BEEN A HAPPY PERSON?
variable.value: A GOOD BIT OF THE TIME

variable.name: SF31
variable.description: THESE QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT HOW YOU FEEL AND HOW THINGS HAVE BEEN WITH YOU DURING THE PAST MONTH. FOR EACH QUESTION, PLEASE INDICATE THE ONE ANSWER THAT COMES CLOSEST TO THE WAY YOU HAVE BEEN FEELING. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE PAST MONTH... DID YOU FEEL TIRED?
variable.value: A GOOD BIT OF THE TIME

variable.name: SF32
variable.description: THESE QUESTIONS ARE ABOUT HOW YOU FEEL AND HOW THINGS HAVE BEEN WITH YOU DURING THE PAST MONTH. FOR EACH QUESTION, PLEASE INDICATE THE ONE ANSWER THAT COMES CLOSEST TO THE WAY YOU HAVE BEEN FEELING. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE PAST MONTH... HAS YOUR HEALTH LIMITED YOUR SOCIAL ACTIVITIES (LIKE VISITING WITH FRIENDS OR CLOSE RELATIVES)?
variable.value: A GOOD BIT OF THE TIME

variable.name: SF33
variable.description: PLEASE CHOOSE THE ANSWER THAT BEST DESCRIBES HOW TRUE OR FALSE EACH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS IS FOR YOU I SEEM TO GET SICK A LITTLE EASIER THAN OTHER PEOPLE

variable.name: SF34
variable.description: PLEASE CHOOSE THE ANSWER THAT BEST DESCRIBES HOW TRUE OR FALSE EACH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS IS FOR YOU I AM AS HEALTHY AS ANYBODY I KNOW

variable.name: SF35
variable.description: PLEASE CHOOSE THE ANSWER THAT BEST DESCRIBES HOW TRUE OR FALSE EACH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS IS FOR YOU I EXPECT MY HEALTH TO GET WORSE

variable.name: SF36
variable.description: PLEASE CHOOSE THE ANSWER THAT BEST DESCRIBES HOW TRUE OR FALSE EACH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS IS FOR YOU MY HEALTH IS EXCELLENT
